data.title: Master-Planned Communities
data.meta_description: Find out about master-planned communities throughout the GTA. Register and get first access to the best prices and floor plan choices.
data.text:
Top Master-Planned Communities in the GTA

If you follow real estate and development throughout the GTA, you’ve probably heard the term “master-planned community” and you might be wondering exactly what that means. The best way we can describe a master-planned community is as an area that has been strategically designed right from the start to be a vibrant pocket where it’s possible to live, work, play and run errands all within a few blocks. Read More >>

An ambitious master-planned community is coming to a growing area of North York. This development will sit at 1 Concorde Gate in the south-east corner of the Don Valley Parkway and Eglinton Avenue East.

This new development plans to redevelop the three existing office buildings that currently sit on the site with nine sleek residential towers.

Read More

10481 Yonge Street Master-Planned Community is a new development by Nahid in Richmond Hill. This pre-construction project is located along the highly-coveted Yonge Street near the Yonge Street and Elgin Mills Road West intersection. Once completed, this prestigious development will consist of 7 massive towers and 45 urban townhomes.

Read More

144 First Avenue is an upcoming master-planned community that will bring new condo residences, vibrant retail, and pedestrian-friendly spaces to the heart of the city. With immediate access to a future GO Transit station, this will also be a much-needed transit-oriented community in the Durham Region that anticipates plenty of daily traffic in the near future.

Read More

1580 Dundas Street East Master-Planned Community is a pre construction development located on the southeast and southwest corners of Dundas Street East and Mattawa Avenue in Mississauga. This proposed community comprises 3,027 residential suites spread across five main areas and ten buildings.

Read More

1735 Steeles Avenue West is a master-planned pre-construction condominium community to be located near the southwest corner of Steeles Avenue West and Financial Drive in Brampton.

Read More

An exciting, mixed-use development project is coming soon to beautiful cottage country!

175 Essa Road is a proposed master-planned community in Barrie, located at the junction of Hwy 400 and Essa Road, a vital route to Lake Simcoe. This ambitious project will see the rise of nine condo towers and dozens of townhome blocks encompassing 2,828 new residential units.

Read More

This project is close to an employment centre and commercial district, which makes it an incredibly attractive place for investors and home buyers alike. The end result is going to be over 23 acres of new development that will bring tremendous new density to the region.

Read More

180 Steeles Avenue West Condos is a new Master-Planned Community in Vaughan. This new pre-construction project by Mizrahi Developments and Constantine Enterprises is located at 180 Steeles Ave W Near by intersection of Yonge and Steeles. Four high-rise towers and two other mid-rise towers with a total of 2,080 residential units.

Read More

A proposal was recently submitted to the City of Toronto to build an expansive five tower master-planned community at 1881 Steeles Avenue West, located in the south-east corner of Dufferin Street and Steeles. This proposal was developed by First Capital Realty, one of the largest owners and developers of mixed-use real-estate in Canada.

Read More

This pre-construction project will be located in the south-east corner of Eglinton Avenue East and Pharmacy Avenue, just minutes from the future Pharmacy LRT Station in Golden Mile neighbourhood. This development will consist of a mixed-use, multi-tower development with five towers that will range from 10 to 48-storeys tall.

Read More

An ambitious reimagining of one of east Toronto’s most famous commercial areas looks to create nothing short of a new downtown area set along the city’s newest transit expressway. This development will contain 5,529 residential units spread out over nearly two dozen buildings. Complementing these homes will be retail and commercial space parsed out in smaller measure throughout the 28.4 acre-site.

Read More

Located at the intersection of Eglinton and Warden Avenue, 1920 Eglinton Avenue East is a pre-construction master-planned community that will use its premium location as one of the stops on the future Crosstown LRT to fulfill its role as a transit-oriented real estate development that caters to residents with commutes across the city.

Read More

With this new transit line on its way, comes many real estate proposals, one of which includes a five-tower, mixed-use master-planned community coming to 1960 Eglinton Avenue East. This master-planned community will sit in the north-east corner of Eglinton Avenue East and Warden Avenue, directly adjacent from the future Golden Mile Station that will run on the Line 5 Eglinton Crosstown LRT.

Read More

This is a development unlike any other. It is located on the site of a former Mr Christie's factory. It is set in a premium location next to the waterfront. It is also the last remaining undeveloped parcel of land in the Humber Bay Shores. The potential for this project is nearly unlimited. Aware of what is at stake, developers First Capital are sure to make the most of this rare opportunity.

Read More

Etobicoke is set to undergo its most dramatic change ever. An ambitious new project aims to completely revitalize Toronto’s west-end waterfront.

Not only will it alter the skyline, but improve Toronto at a fundamental level.

Read More

This exciting master-planned project offers a delightful blend of residential, office, retail, and community spaces. Spanning a 5.48-hectare site that currently houses the Vaughan Mills shopping centre, the vision for redevelopment is nothing short of spectacular.

Read More

Set to transform a mostly vacant stretch of land in Eatonville Etobicoke, 300 The East Mall Master-Planned Community by KingSett Capital will add four residential towers to the corner of Bloor Street and the East Mall. The project will also bring 9,000 square feet of retail, new road infrastructure, a beautiful public park as well appointed two-storey townhomes.

Read More

The City of Markham is constantly growing and there are many pre-construction condominiums coming to the corner of Highway 7 and Warden Avenue - This area is not planning to slow down anytime soon. In fact, a new master-planned community is slated for development in this area.

Read More

This revolutionary master-planned development is coming to lift the face of one of Scarborough’s most charming residential neighbourhoods. This project will sit on 10-acres of land and transform this quickly changing area in Scarborough.

As the area grows and expands this master-planned community will help accommodate and enhance its future uses.

Read More

The community is projected to stand nestled between Lake Shore Blvd E and Cherry Street, right in the heart of Toronto’s bustling city. The large scale development will be of mixed-use, boasting a comprised 2.4 million square feet. The project allots space for an assortment of office and retail spaces, public areas, and of course residential space.

Read More

With a wide range of layouts, this is a fantastic opportunity to invest in a high-energy urban location in downtown Toronto, with prime access to rapid transit, restaurants, bars and entertainment venues. Spanning almost three acres, this unique urban community will add four condominium towers to the neighbourhood, while adding significant streetscape improvements to Clarence Square Park, which sites immediately north.

Read More

This project looks to further intensify tand invigorate the quickly-evolving neighbourhood. This excitingly ambitious redevelopment will sit near Keele Street and St.Clair Avenue, near major arterial roads, excellent transit and everyday conveniences. Currently, The community is undergoing a metamorphosis as a significant amount of high-rise and high-density developments are increasingly being proposed here.

Read More

A thrilling, multi-building, high-rise project is coming to North Brampton! 4400 Queen Street East is a pre-construction master-planned community. Located at the intersection of The Gore Road and Queen Street East, this development will see the rise of 7 condo towers, adding 2,461 new homes.

Read More

This excellent investment opportunity is located in Kerr Village, one of Oakville's most transit-oriented and vibrant neighbourhoods. It will consist of 7 mixed-use condo buildings with 11 towers ranging in size from 8 to 28-storeys. This is one place where you'd want to live!

Read More

With many revitalizing projects underway for Pickering, this city has become Durham’s focal point of urban regeneration. As the region evolves it is increasingly becoming more livable and desirable presenting investors with significant returns on investments.

Read More

This project sits in what is easily Scarborough’s fastest-growing district. Just steps from the region’s main retail, lifestyle and transportation hub, it’s a rapidly urbanizing area that’s actively seeing a record number of condominiums built and proposed. It’s a great place to consider investing in.

Read More

A mixed-use high-density block will be located adjacent to Yonge Street containing 6 buildings and 7 towers of 25, 55, 50, 30, 45, 40, and 35-storeys. Each tower will sit atop a 6-storey podium. This block will have 3,805 suites. The non-residential space shared between the buildings will accommodate retail, commercial and community space.

Read More

An excitingly bold rejuvenation project has been proposed for Hamilton’s City Centre Mall. 77 James Street North is a master-planned community proposed by IN8 Developments in Hamilton. This project looks to further intensify downtown Hamilton with four towering mixed-use residential and commercial developments.

Read More

A new master-planned community will be coming to the north-west corner of Jane Street and Highway 7 in Vaughan. This development will bring many residential units, office and commercial space to the community and will surely be a contributing factor to the population and employment growth to the area.

Read More

88 Queen Master-Planned Community is an exciting development that invigorates the downtown core. It consists of four new towers, two of which are condominiums. These great homes make for smart investments that cater to contemporary urban living.

Read More

This master-planned community will offer sleek, modern condominium towers that will add to the growing number of residential, commercial and office space that’s coming to the area.

This pre-construction project is located at 91 Eglinton Ave E, in the north-east corner of Eglinton Avenue East and Hurontario Street, just minutes from Highway 403.

Investors can expect an incredible six tower complex that will sit on almost 12-acres of land.

Read More

An ambitious new master-planned community is coming to the south-east corner of Markham Road and Major Mackenzie Drive in Markham. This development will create many new and much-needed residential units in this vibrant, family-friendly area. Investors can expect this community to span an incredible 31.7 acres and will include a mix of housing types such as townhomes and condominium units.

Read More

Vaughan is arguably becoming one of the fastest growing suburbs in the GTA. We can expect this area to be booming with employment and high-rises in the near future. The plan will include a total of 13 mixed-use, high-rise towers with heights ranging between 22 and 38-storeys. The towers will be developed in 6 blocks, will include new roads, retail spaces and public outdoor parks.

Read More

This mall is on the northwest corner of Sheppard and Kennedy, and it has been a community staple in Scarborough for 50 years. But as the economy and commercial interests of the community continues to evolve, it no longer keeps up with modern demand.

Read More

The buildings will be complete with progressive modern exterior, including structurally unique projected balconies that make it stand out from the downtown core’s many high rise buildings. It’s minimalist yet luxurious design makes it inviting, and well suited to its chic surroundings.

Read More

Years in the making, this ambitious development looks to achieve nothing less than replacing a prior landmark with a completely new one. As an easterly-redevelopment of the former Downsview Airport, this future community aims to set the city standard for premium urban living with its sustainable practices, diverse land use, and transit-oriented residences.

Read More

Welcome to this picturesque enclave of perfectly designed homes nestled in nature. Angus Glen South Village is a pre-construction master-planned community by Kylemore Communities. The homes featured here will include well-appointed contemporary towns, semis and detached single-family homes.

Read More

This community is going to add a splash of colour to one of the most central locations in the city. This new development doubles as a public gallery, and it will be steps away from world class entertainment, restaurants, theatre, and so much more.

Read More

Introducing Auberge on the Park by Tridel, starting to welcome occupants in 2021. This North York master-planned community backs onto the sprawling Sunnybrook Park, transforming an iconic site into a leafy, walkable district with thoroughly modern architecture. Architectural firm Graziani + Corazza has is designing the towers, a firm with a prolific portfolio of stylish condominium buildings to their name.

Read More

Backyard Neighbourhood Condos is a master-planned community under development in the heart of South Etobicoke. Just north of the growing Queensway stretch and west of the picturesque Humber River, this is a prime location that continues to urbanize and welcome new forms of housing. Etobicoke is a booming part of the GTA with a robust employment sector that continues to welcome new residents and employees.

Read More

Bayside Toronto is a vibrant, mixed-use master-planned luxury waterfront community part of the Waterfront Toronto Revitalization Act. It is situated on a 13 acre site along Toronto’s water's edge between Parliament Street to the east, Lower Sherbourne Street to the west and south of Queens Quay. This is the largest such initiative currently underway along the the shores of Lake Ontario.

Read More

Beltline Yards Master-Planned Community is a pre-construction mixed-use development in Toronto. The new project by Hullmark Developments will transform approximately 39 acres of land in the Fairbank neighbourhood. Located at 250 Bowie Avenue, Beltline Yards will be a design-led neighbourhood that will reshape the neighbourhood it occupies and living in Toronto as a whole.

Read More

Brightwater is a joint project, harnessing the talents, knowledge and vision of four major GTA developers, Kilmer Group, Dream, Diamond Corp., and Fram + Slokker. Kilmer Group is responsible for the widely-acclaimed master-planned community, Canary District, in Toronto.

Read More

An ambitious master-planned community is coming to the heart of Pickering. Brookdale Centre Redevelopment is a new high-rise condominium development by Tribute Communities. When completed it will consist of four distinct phases and will feature six condos, each with a six-storey podium, and 14 towers ranging from 17 to 35 storeys.

Read More

A long-awaited development is coming to the shores of Calabogie Lake in the Ottawa Valley, and we can't take our eyes off it! This new pre-construction project will span 700 to over 2,100 acres and include modern stacked townhomes and condo suites.

Read More

A new invigorating master-planned community is coming to the thriving City of Caledon. This future development will feature modern and sophisticated homes situated in a convenient locale.

Caledon Trails is a new pre-construction townhouse and single family home development by Laurier Homes and Yorkwood Homes. The new community will be located at McLaughlin Road & Mayfield Road.

Read More

One of Toronto’s most significant intersections is anticipating major revitalization efforts. Oxford Properties located at 2180 Yonge Street is a new pre-construction master-planned community in Midtown Toronto. Here, the developers are looking to revisit their current site named Canada Square, and redefine its values to create a more connected, transit-oriented, neighbourhood.

Read More

Meet one of the east end’s most anticipated revitalizations, Canary District. This mixed-use community near downtown Toronto has already made headlines and snagged industry awards, including BILD’s Community of the Year designation in 2014 and a Canadian Architect Award of Excellence.

Read More

Centerpoint Mall Redevelopment will be built by Revenue Properties Company and will be located on 6464 Yonge St in North York's Newtonbrook neighbourhood on Steeles and Yonge. This master-planned community will include thirty-three buildings of various heights with a total of 8,325 residential units and a large park.

Read More

Recently announced plans by developer Cadillac Fairview Corporation show the major shopping mall owner and operator will invest $80 million to transform 230,000 square feet of existing department store and other retail space at CF Fairview Mall into new stores and restaurants as well as improve pedestrian access to the mall.

Read More

It’s no secret that the area around The Vaughan Mills Shopping Centre is transforming at a rapid pace. The incredible influx of development in the area is unprecedented and much of it begins with the expansion of the Toronto Subway Line. Charisma Master-planned community is located on Jane Street next to the world-renowned Vaughan Mills Mall, and it is set to reap the rewards of an accessible location full of the best local amenities.

Read More

he Cloverdale Mall redevelopment is a massive master-planned community. It is being made by mall owners QuadReal. The major intersection is Dundas Street West and Highway 427. It is audacious in depth and peerless in scope. It will replace the existing Cloverdale Mall with a completely redesigned mixed-use community. In fact, the change will be so drastic that locals will likely only recognize the roads that surround it.

Read More

Concord CityPlace is a dynamic urban oasis set on 45 acres of land and is Toronto’s first downtown master-planned, combined-use community. The area is bounded by Blue Jays Way to the east, Lake Shore Boulevard to the south, Bathurst Street to the west and Front Street East to the north. It is built on former rail lands situated between the downtown core and the waterfront.

Read More

From the developers who brought us one of downtown’s largest master-planned communities, comes their newest project in North York. Occupying 45 acres near Sheppard Avenue and Leslie Street, this green and luxurious development will eventually house 9,000 residents in a combination of condominium towers and townhome villas, along with state-of-the-art community facilities.

Read More

Connected Urban Community is a new master-planned community coming to the town of Milton. Investors can expect three residential towers that will be connected by a 2-storey podium as well as a mix of stacked townhomes and traditional townhomes.

Read More

A stunning new master-planned community is coming to the growing region of Prince Edward County. Cork & Vine project will consist of detached, semi-detached homes and townhomes, making it perfect for families and investors alike.

Read More

This master-planned community follows a plan both vibrant and clever, capitalizing on the area’s proposed crosstown LRT. Crosstown, a 60-acre redevelopment at Eglinton Avenue East and Don Mills Road, is an ambitious project that will eventually include residential and commercial space, as well as extensive parkland, pedestrian walkways and a recreation centre.

Read More

This is your opportunity to own a piece of Toronto’s true centre. With shopping, the PATH system, and Bloor-Yonge station at your doorstep, the whole Greater Toronto Area can be yours at this master-planned community.

Cumberland Square will be directly located on the Bloor Yonge intersection, with its primary address being 2 Bloor Street West. This project involves redeveloping much of the entire city block, bringing three new towers to the continuously rising neighbourhood. It will be developed by KingSett Capital.

Read More

We’ve already talked a lot about the tremendous growth in downtown Mississauga and this master-planned community has been an icon in that area from the very start. Daniels City Centre, a mixed-use community brought to you by The Daniels Corporation, welcomed its inaugural towers back in 2004. The Capital Condominiums, each standing 30 storeys, are now considered architectural landmarks in the region.

Read More

Daniels Corporation is planning a big surprise for Mississauga: a vibrant, mixed-use community that includes three residential towers, shops and community resources, even a farmer’s market. If you want to invest in a rapidly-growing neighbourhood and be part of a friendly, yet urban community, consider Daniels Erin Mills.

Read More

Daniels Waterfront Master-Planned Community is designed with art and culture at its core, transforming a stretch of Toronto’s East Bayfront neighbourhood into a place where you can live, work, play, learn and create. Meet Daniels Waterfont – City of the Arts, one of downtown’s most-talked-about urban revitalizations.

Read More

Dockside Whitby offers one of the most exciting chances to own waterfront property in the GTA. It’s part of a plan to revitalize the land surrounding Port Whitby, and it’s due to dramatically grow the population and employment in the area.

Read More

Don Valley Reconnects Master-Planned Community is a new project proposed by Cityzen Development Group & Tercot Communities in the Flemingdon Park neighbourhood. This distinctive community will replace the privately run Flemingdon Park Golf Club, which currently occupies 40 acres of land along the Don River at 155 St. Dennis Drive.

Read More

Welcome to Downtown Erin MIlls a master-planned, blended-use condominium community in the Eglinton Avenue West and Glen Erin Drive in the Erin Mills neighbourhood of Mississauga. It’s situated opposite Erin Mills Town Centre. This development will embody four 18-storey residential towers with approximately 198 suites each, surrounded by way of landscaped gardens and natural green space.

Read More

Downtown Markham, the area’s most anticipated mixed-use master-planned project, has launched! Downtown Markham Master-Planned Community will be a true game changer, combining luxury living, covetable office space, high-end retail and decadent cuisine in a pedestrian-friendly neighbourhood.

Read More

This master-planned community will include a new, pedestrian-friendly street that will run north and south of the development site. This new road will safely separate the four residential towers, the existing portion of Dufferin Mall and the above-grade parking portion of the site.

Read More

This master-planned community is being developed by First Gulf — one of the most trusted builders in the Toronto real estate market. They’re renowned for their ability to successfully develop land, making them perfect choice to transform this underused land into a thriving community.

Read More

An ambitious new master-planned community is coming to the transforming City of Kitchener. This development will consist of four mixed-use, mid-rise condominiums built in a square complex between Weber Street East and Fergus Avenue in Kitchener. Three of the buildings will be connected by a 5-storey podium which will give residents of each building the chance to enjoy all of the optimal amenities spread throughout the podium.

Read More

Meet Elgin East, a master-planned community under development in the GTA’s Richmond Hill region. Occupancy begins in 2020. Occupying a large parcel of land at 1000 Elgin Mills Road East - between Leslie and Bayview - this community will eventually add over 550 new residential units to the area.

Read More

Emerald City is a master-plan urban community perched atop an elevated knoll in North York’s highest vantage point. It has breathtaking 360’ views of Toronto’s downtown skyline, as well as overlooking lush green spaces that surrounds its vast vicinity. When Almadev formulated the idea for Emerald City, they sought a location that offers the best of all worlds.

Read More

Emerald Heights will be a mixed-use, transit-oriented development sitting at the northwest corner of Bramalea Rd and Steeles Ave E in Brampton. A welcome addition to the Bramalea neighbourhood, this master-planned community will feature 20-plus buildings ranging between 8- and 38-storeys high, adding a proposed 3,800 residences and 800 jobs to the area.

Read More

The Exchange District master-planned community is a new, ambitious project that boldly looks to redefine Mississauga’s urban centre as a vibrant meeting place. Instead of a concrete jungle overgrown with sprawling parking lots, the city centre is set to become a bustling community that powers the local economic economy, leading surrounding environs by example. To do that, people need to come, and for that, they need a reason.

Read More

Expo City’s first two phases, a pair of 37-storey towers that share a sleek podium, are fully occupied. Their third phase, Nord Condos, recently had its official launch and is currently in the pre-construction phase. Prices for the Nord series start in the 300’s with square footage ranging from 676 to 2,191.

Read More

This master-planned community takes advantage of the forthcoming Sheppard East LRT line, as well as prime proximity to Fairview Mall, one of North York’s most popular shopping destinations. Three striking condominium towers, an elegant courtyard and a park will make this a stunning urban oasis to call home. Introducing Fairview Park, by FRAM + Slokker.

Read More

Welcome to exciting new horizons in Ontario's cottage country, where every day feels like Friday. Over 1,500 more units are yet to come, presenting an unrivalled opportunity to own an exquisite waterfront residence.

Read More

One of midtown’s most anticipated mixed-use transformations is ready to launch and you can be first in line to call this stylish and thoughtful master-planned community home. Reimagine Galleria, a modern re-imagining of the former strip mall at Dufferin and Dupont Streets.

Read More

This master-planned community offers unsurpassable views of downtown Toronto and Lake Ontario and will act as a gateway to one of the city’s hottest districts. Distinctly modern residential towers, a retail galleria and an expansive public park are just some of the hallmarks of Garrison Point, a hotly-anticipated urban development in Toronto’s west end.

Read More

Golden Mile Shopping Centre Redevelopment will be so large in size that it will be divided into four phases with 8 separate blocks labelled from A-J. The first phase involves relocating the existing shopping centre to the northernmost point of the development. Block A will replace the grocery store that is currently residing in the mall. This block will also have a small galleria with additional retail and office space.

Read More

Grand Central Mimico is a new Master-Planned Community by VANDYK Group in Etobicoke. This complex will consist of three mixed-use towers that will be known as the Grand Central Mimico Master-Planned Community. This development will sit at 23 Buckingham Street, south-east of Royal York Road and the Gardiner Expressway, just steps from Mimico GO Station.

Read More

Planned as an inclusive one-stop destination, this development is being planned as a harmonious combination of high-density mixed-use residential and commercial space where residents can live, work, and play — all at the same place.

Read More

The Humbertown Redevelopment is a pre-construction master-planned community that will be built in and around the currently standing Humbertown Mall, a shopping centre located at 270 The Kingsway in the affluent Etobicoke neighbourhood of Edenbridge-Humber Valley.

Read More

IQ is a master-planned community located in Etobicoke’s Islington City Centre neighbourhood and developed by Remington Homes.

Occupying an eight-acre parcel of land between Zorra Street and St. Lawrence Avenue, it’s anchored by the convenient Islington and The Queensway intersection. IQ is all about smart urban living, where comfort, design and contemporary style work together.

Read More

Situated in the heart of Etobicoke, Islington Terrace Master-Planned Community is family-friendly and built by one of the region’s leading experts on environmentally-friendly developments. Islington Terrace, by Tridel, is set to define the up-and-coming pocket of Islington City Centre.

Read More

A stunning new development featuring new housing, retail, a community centre, and more is coming to the current site of Jane Finch Mall.

Read More

A major feature of this expansive project is a 26-hectare conservation area which will be a green oasis in the heart of the city. Not to mention, there will be over 600,000 square feet of employment and institutional use and another 200,000 square feet of cultural space.

Read More

The Lawrence Heights Revitalization master-planned community will be bordered by Dufferin Street to the west, Highway 401 to the north, Bathurst Street to the east and Lawrence Avenue West to the south. Standing at 221 Ranee Avenue, it will be located in the heart of North York by shopping and major highways.

Read More

The Canadian furniture and appliance company Leon's is making an exciting foray into real estate. Redeveloping its longstanding headquarters at the southeast corner of Highways 400 and 401, the furniture maker intends to redevelop 40 prime acres of land into a mixed-use master-planned community. Leon's initial announcement reveals plans for residential and retail elements within the North York development. This project is slated to be built in two phases.

Read More

This is an upcoming, family-oriented development in the stunning City of Kawartha Lakes.

Lindsay Heights is a pre-construction master-planned community by Tribute Communities in Lindsay. This mixed-use development will bring over 2,800 residential units in a combination of townhouses, semis, and 30', 36', 40', and 50' detached homes to 460 Thunder Bridge Road.

Read More

Lock & Quay is a new master-planned community by LIV Communities to be located at 1 Quaker Road in Welland. Between 3,800 and 4,500 new residential units will be present, with a mixture of townhouses and mixed-use mid-rise condos surrounded by sprawling parkland and outdoor patio areas with stunning views of the water. This community will rest on 153 acres of land and bring the best Welland offers to your doorstep.

Read More

This mixed-use master-planned community will be built with future employment opportunities in mind, making it convenient for residents that are looking to live and work in the same vicinity. The increase of employment in this area makes this real-estate property attractive to investors and home-buyers.

Read More

M City is a master-planned community that sits in a great location, just steps from the popular Square One Shopping Centre. It’s largely considered to be a one of the area’s landmark condominium communities. With the addition of retail space, cafes, pedestrian walkways and the large park, M City will become a vibrant, walkable community, where socializing is encouraged, great ideas are sparked and coming home at the end of the day is a luxury.

Read More

Situated on a sizable parcel of land, this multi-phase project will be a community in itself, featuring condominiums, townhomes, retail space and a network of new streets and pedestrian pathways. The site for this project occupies the southwest corner of Yonge Street and Cummer Avenue, just north of Finch Avenue. Its municipal address is 5915 Yonge Street.

Read More

Malvern Town Centre is a master-planned community proposed by Davpart in Scarborough. The project will add significant housing, retail and public space to help animate and add density to the growing Scarborough region.

Read More

These exciting new developments will replace an unsightly sea of parking lots and take advantage of exceptional neighbourhood amenities, including multimodal transit systems and family-friendly community facilities.

Read More

An upcoming master-planned community by CreateTO, the City of Toronto and Waterfront Toronto will provide a film-friendly and inclusive community for Port Lands productions, interactive and creative (PIC) district.

McCleary District will span 50 acres and will be located at 601-755 Lake Shore Blvd E, bordered by Lake Shore Blvd E to the north, Commissioners Street to the south, and bookended by the Don Valley River and McCleary Park.

Read More

Be part of one of the most highly-anticipated communities east of Toronto, in a region designated as part of Urban Toronto’s “Growth to Watch For 2017” study. This meticulously-planned neighbourhood is steps from Scarborough Town Centre and features luxurious living spaces, contemporary design and a full roster of A-list amenities. Welcome to ME Living, by the LASH Group.

Read More

The Milton Education Village is a new master-planned mixed-use community bringing much-needing residential, commercial, and institutional space to Milton. This 400-acre development is located at Tremaine Road and Louis St. Laurent Avenue.

Read More

This transformative project is located in Brampton's Mount Pleasant neighbourhood at 10124-10244 Mississauga Rd, on the northwest corner of Bovaird Dr. West and Mississauga Rd. Plans show we can expect 42 buildings rising up to 14 storeys high with a total of 898 units.

Read More

Spanning almost five acres, this project will completely revitalize the growing stretch, adding five sleek residential towers, along with retail and commercial space. Notting Hill master-planned community is under development by Lanterra in Etobicoke’s Humber Heights - Westmount neighbourhood.

Read More

Minto Group is behind this new community. Minto Group to create a neighbourhood with an urban feel that still retains a sense of a small town community. Minto is building a condo townhouse development that sports a stylish modern design that give the entire community a fresh dynamic.

Read More

Oakville Green Master-Planned Community is a pre construction development by Queensgate Homes in the West Oak Trails neighbourhood.

Five development blocks will present a vibrant mix of residential, commercial, healthcare, and educational buildings.

Read More

This modern collection of condominiums is coming to transform this growing Niagara area. It is exactly what the town needs to accommodate the population influx expected for this emerging community in the centre of the Niagara Region.

Read More

The urban community will sit at 3069 Dundas St on the northside of Dundas Street West, east and west of Bronte Road and south of Highway 407 in Oakville's growing Palermo neighbourhood. As a planned major transit area this community is set to become one of Oakville's bustling urban hubs, offering a plethora of everyday conveniences for its residents.

Read More

Panda Markham master-planned community is an ambitious pre-construction project set to redefine the skyline of this northern Toronto suburb with its stunning architectural design, breathtaking views, and practical solutions that will put Markham on the map as the Greater Toronto Area’s new favourite downtown destination..

Read More

Spanning 30 acres, the site sits at Burnhamthorpe Road West and Confederation Parkway, just steps to the west of Square One Shopping Centre. Once completed, Parkside Village will consist of 15 condominium towers, two blocks of townhomes, over 150,000-square-feet of retail and commercial space, and three acres of parkland. Before Spending Time on Your Property Search, Our Investment Presentation Seminar Is a Must, and It’s Available Twice a Week.

We’ll help you find the perfect master-planned community

Master-Planned communities usually involve condominiums or townhomes, integrated retail and office space, pedestrian paths and public greenspace. Sometimes they even involve integrated public transit, as seen in east Toronto’s Canary District, which has a brand-new streetcar line running through the community.

They can be as expansive as the 100-acre SmartCentres, slated to add 17-million-square-feet of residential and commercial space to the Vaughan Metropolitan Centre, or cozy and modern like downtown Toronto’s 7-acre Garrison Point project, which involves two towers, upscale retail and a public park. The Daniels Erin Mills community in Mississauga even has its own farmer’s market.

Either way, many people consider these kinds of communities to be the way of the future for housing in the GTA. As the city grows, many residents are looking for a more walkable, livable lifestyle where their time can be spent enjoying life in a lively and convenient setting. Gone are the days when it was considered normal to hop in the car and drive twenty minutes just to get your groceries or meet friends for a lunch date. Today’s modern homeowners want access to an array of lifestyle amenities and they want them at their fingertips. That’s where master-planned communities come in.

Anticipating the growing number of families who are choosing to raise their children in more urban districts, many of these projects come with well-planned, family-friendly aspects too. Islington Terrace, for example, a community under construction in the heart of Etobicoke, comes with an expansive shared podium that features both outdoor and indoor play spaces for kids, including a splash pad and playground facilities.

In these kinds of communities, it’s typical to see colleagues meeting for coffee at street-level cafes that occupy the first floor of condominium buildings, neighbours walking dogs or playing impromptu soccer games in a central green space, or residents enjoying modern amenities like rooftop pools, barbeque dinners on the terrace or state-of-the-art gyms.

There are so many exciting master-planned projects coming to the GTA! Whether you want to be part of a distinctly urban enclave in downtown Toronto, or a network of homes that backs onto lush ravine land in Markham, we’ll help you find the perfect master-planned community.
